attributes.action: Change rules of car insurance to have it assigned to car not driver
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Because insurance is assigned to both car and person these rules are abused by insurers. 
Let's say You have one car but 2 drivers - You need to pay almost twice and one policy at any time is not in use [can both drivers drive same car at the same time??? NO]

Insurance should be assigned to CAR whilst it covers for damage caused by it - regardless if anybody is driving it or not [i.e. car parked on a slope moved and hit something due to handbrake failure whilst nobody was inside].

In this system car owner [who get discounts for no claims] is responsible in terms of these discounts if car is involved in collision whilst somebody else driven under his/her permission.
This will persuade people to let their
cars driven only by responsible drivers [i.e. if somebody drive to a pub and let to drive back the person who did not drinked alkohol or in case of long journeys drivers can change to improve SAFETY]
